content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command to browse the website https://www.atlasobscura.com/ and search for interesting places to visit. Your computer returned that the website provides a directory of unique destinations and stories about places and foods offered by Atlas Obscura. It also mentions upcoming trips, experiences, and courses. Readers can contribute to the Atlas by adding and editing places. The website has several links including Trips, Experiences, Courses, and Places.'}
"""

Do not execute this command again with the same arguments.'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "best resources to learn different languages"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://www.businessinsider.com/guides/learning/best-online-apps-courses-to-learn-new-language", "https://www.theintrepidguide.com/top-language-learning-resources/", "https://nymag.com/strategist/article/how-to-learn-languages-at-home.html", "https://www.quora.com/What-are-the-best-language-learning-resources", "https://www.lingualift.com/blog/best-language-learning-resources/", "https://www.inc.com/larry-kim/9-places-to-learn-a-new-language-online-for-fre.html", "https://www.alllanguageresources.com/", "https://matadornetwork.com/bnt/8-free-online-resources-for-learning-a-new-language/"]'}]
